channel.title: Fedora25 on Arboleda

item.title: installing unreal engine on fedora 25
item.description: Linking GitHub with EpicGames In this article you’ll find a way to get unreal engine and make it work on fedora 25. Firstly, you need to signup in github and then link your github account with your epic games account: https://www.unrealengine.com/ue4-on-github Then you should receive an email confirming you joined up to the epic games organization. Once you receive it, you can clone the source code of unreal engine: git clone https://github.
